column1: Art Institute of Chicago////I don't get to museums as often as I'd like
column3: part of it makes me feel older or more serious or mature or something (and those that have ever read any of my reviews know I'm rarely that)
column4: like those in this portrait. This piece personifies all the people watching that goes on at a museum
column5: because we just can't stare at walls for hours (at least I can't).
